column1: Tosser Grubb is a Hobbits in The Hobbit (film series). He was was portrayed by Merv Smith.
Tosser Grubb was the auctioneer for Messrs Grubb
column2: Grubb and Burrowes in charge of selling Bilbo Bagginss possessions and Bag End. When Bilbo himself arrived
column3: Tosser was apprehensive. Bilbo gave him the contract he had with the Dwarves
column4: which Tosser found sufficient to prove his identity.The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
